rental_calc.title: Rental Calculator
rental_calc.description: Calculate the potential cashflow for residential rental properties based on the expenses and rental income.

flip_calc.title: Fix & Flip Calculator
flip_calc.description: Calculate the potential profit from rehabbing a distressed property. This calculator calculates profit by comparing the after repair value (ARV) to the cost of the property and the rehab costs.

brrrr_calc.title: BRRRR Calculator
brrrr_calc.description: The Buy, Rehab, Rent, Refinance, Repeat (BRRRR) method is a strategy where you rehab a property, then rent it out, and refinance it to pull equity out. This calculator projects the potential cashflow and equity available after refinancing.

wholesale_calc.title: Wholesale Calculator
wholesale_calc.description: Calculate the potential profit from assigning a contract from a seller to a buyer.

target_calc.title: Price Target Calculator
target_calc.description: Calculate the price to pay for a property to meet your cashflow goals. This calculator also calculates the price to pay to break even. The range between the break even price and target price should lead to cashflow.

commercial_calc.title: Commercial Multi-Family Calculator
commercial_calc.description: Calculate the potential cashflow for commercial properties based on the expenses and rental income.

purchase_price.title: Purchase Price
purchase_price.description: The amount paid for the property.

insurance_cost.title: Annual Insurance Cost
insurance_cost.description: The amount paid in annual insurance costs.

down_payment.title: Down Payment
down_payment.description: The portion of the property's purchase price paid upfront in cash by the buyer.

interest_rate.title: Interest Rate
interest_rate.description: The interest rate on the mortgage.

closing_costs.title: Closing Costs
closing_costs.description: Additional costs paid alongside the down payment. Either a percentage of the purchase price or a fixed amount.

property_tax.title: Property Taxes
property_tax.description: The amount paid in property taxes. Either a percentage of the property value or a fixed amount annually.

rehab_cost.title: Rehab Cost
rehab_cost.description: The total cost of rehabbing the property. This includes, but is not limited to, the cost of materials and labor.

monthly_rent.title: Monthly Rent
monthly_rent.description: The sum of the gross rent from each unit within the property.

capex.title: Capital Expenditures
capex.description: Infrequent expenses used to improve or extend the life of a property. Typically a percentage (e.g., 5-10%) of rent is set aside for this purpose.

vacancy_rate.title: Vacancy Rate
vacancy_rate.description: The percentage of time the property is vacant.

rehab_time.title: Rehab Time
rehab_time.description: The time it takes to rehab the property.

arv.title: After Repair Value (ARV)
arv.description: The estimated value of the property after it is rehabbed.

agent_commission.title: Agent Commission
agent_commission.description: The percentage (or fixed amount) of the sale price paid to the agent.

refinance_cost.title: Refinance Cost
refinance_cost.description: The cost of refinancing the property.

contract_price.title: Contract Price
contract_price.description: The amount owed to the seller for the property.

months_held.title: Months Held
months_held.description: The number of months the property (or contract) is held before being sold.

listing_price.title: Listing Price
listing_price.description: The price at which the property is listed for sale.

cap_reserve.title: Capital Reserve
cap_reserve.description: Funds set aside for large expenses or upgrades to a property.

acquisition_cost.title: Additional Acquisition Costs
acquisition_cost.description: Additional costs paid to acquire the property.

gross_fees.title: Gross Fees and Other Income
gross_fees.description: Any additional fees (e.g., parking, pets, etc.) charged to tenants.

operating_expenses.title: Operating Expenses
operating_expenses.description:
Below you may add custom operating expenses (e.g., insurance, utilities, etc.) for the property. These expenses may be paid Monthly, Annually, or Non-recurring (i.e., one-time expenses).
The checkbox below will allow you to save these expenses for later use.

additional_expenses.title: Additional Expenses
additional_expenses.description:
Below you may add custom expenses incurred during the holding period of the property. These expenses may be paid Monthly, Annually, or Non-recurring (i.e., one-time expenses).
The checkbox below will allow you to save these expenses for later use.

annual_cashflow.title: Annual Cashflow
annual_cashflow.description: The net profit from the property on an annual basis after all expenses are paid. Note that Annual Cashflow coounts for vacancy.

monthly_cashflow.title: Monthly Cashflow
monthly_cashflow.description: The net profit from the property on a monthly basis after all expenses are paid. Note that Monthly Cashflow does not account for vacancy (see Annual Cashflow).

cash_on_cash.title: Cash on Cash Return
cash_on_cash.description: The annual pre-tax income an investor earns relative to the cash invested

cash_down.title: Cash Down
cash_down.description: The total amount of cash invested in the property, including the down payment, closing costs, and rehab costs.

cap_rate.title: Cap Rate
cap_rate.description: The ratio of a property's net operating income (NOI) to its purchase price or market value.

dscr.title: Debt Service Coverage Ratio (DSCR)
dscr.description: Measures a property's ability to cover its debt obligations (e.g., mortgage payments) with its net operating income (NOI).

break_even.title: Months to Break Even
break_even.description: The number of months it takes for the property to generate enough cashflow to cover the initial investment.

roi.title: Return on Investment (ROI)
roi.description: The profit from the property as a percentage of the initial purchase price.

cash_roi.title: Cash on Cash ROI
cash_roi.description: The profit from the property as a percentage of the initial cash investment (e.g., down payment, rehab costs, etc.).

net_profit.title: Net Profit
net_profit.description: The amount of money left over after a property is sold.

total_cash_cost.title: Total Cash Costs
total_cash_cost.description: The total amount of cash invested in the property, including the down payment, closing costs, rehab costs, and any costs incurred during the holding period.

annual_cashflow_refi.title: Annual Cashflow After Refinance
annual_cashflow_refi.description: The net profit from the property on an annual basis after all expenses are paid. It is assumed that cashflow will not begin until after the property is refinanced. Note that Annual Cashflow coounts for vacancy.

monthly_cashflow_refi.title: Monthly Cashflow After Refinance
monthly_cashflow_refi.description: The net profit from the property on a monthly basis after all expenses are paid. It is assumed that cashflow will not begin until after the property is refinanced. Note that Monthly Cashflow does not account for vacancy (see Annual Cashflow).

equity_roi.title: Return on Equity (ROE)
equity_roi.description: The equity return as a percentage of the initial cash investment (e.g., down payment, rehab costs, etc.).

equity_usage.title: Maximum Equity Usage
equity_usage.description: The maximum amount of equity that can be used from the property value.

mao.title: Maximum Allowable Offer (MAO)
mao.description: The maximum amount that can be paid for the property to generate profit.

min_sale_price.title: Minimum Sale Price
min_sale_price.description: The minimum suggested sale price of the property.

min_fee.title: Minimum Fee
min_fee.description: The minimum fee that can be charged to the buyer to make a profit.

max_sale_price.title: Maximum Sale Price
max_sale_price.description: The maximum suggested sale price of the property.

max_fee.title: Maximum Fee
max_fee.description: The maximum fee that can be charged to the buyer to make a profit.

wholesale_expense.title: Total Holding Expenses
wholesale_expense.description: The total amount of expenses incurred during the holding period of the property.

target_price.title: Target Price
target_price.description: The price to pay for the property to meet your cashflow goals.

breakeven_price.title: Break Even Price
breakeven_price.description: The price to pay for the property to break even (i.e., the monthly cashflow is zero).

acquisition_cost.title: Total Acquisition Costs
acquisition_cost.description: The total amount of costs incurred to acquire the property.
